reviewText: After a disappointing 3-episode DVD release in 2006, Disney has finally given Goof Troop a better DVD release with Volume 1 and 2, available exclusively from Disney Movie Club. Each volume contains 27 episodes spread across 3 discs. The episodes in Volume 2 are:28. Hallow-Weenies29. Tub Be or Not Tube Be30. Major Goof31. A Goof of the People32. Goof Under My Roof33. Everything's Coming Up Goofy34. Good Neighbor Goof35. Goodbye Mr. Goofy36. Lethal Goofin'37. Frankengoof38. E=MC Goof39. Pete's Day at the Races40. In Goof We Trust41. And Baby Makes Three42. The Incredible Bulk43. Mrs. Spoonerville44. For Pete's Sake45. Big City Blues46. Rally Round the Goof47. Window Pains48. Nightmare on Goof Street49. Where There's a Will, There's a Goof50. Winter Blunderland51. Gymnauseum52. Come Fly With Me53. As Goof Would Have It54. Calling All GoofsEpisodes 33 and 34 are actually the original hour-long special that started the series in it's split syndicated format. These episodes probably should have been on Volume 1 as Episodes 1 and 2. The discs are housed in a standard size DVD case and are stacked. The video quality is in line with other animated shows from this era, like Ducktales and Tale Spin. Disney Movie Club charges $19.99 for each volume. I wouldn't recommend paying much more than that outside of the club.After these 2 volumes, there are still 24 episodes of Goof Troop left to be released, so I'm hoping they will make a Volume 3. There was also a Christmas special that was released several years ago by Disney Movie Club.
summary: They're the Best of Friends Forever!
Title: Disney's Goof Troop: Volume 2, 3-disc Set, 27 Episodes, Disney Exclusive

reviewText: Goofy is one of the best Disney characters and I loved Goof Troop and all the other Disney Afternoon shows and hope that Disney will do right by their fans and give all of their shows old and new full releases on dvd.
Title: Disney's Goof Troop: Volume 2, 3-disc Set, 27 Episodes, Disney Exclusive

reviewText: Disney made Goofy in to a movie star that stands alone as quality entertainment and a classic for all time. From RGB in Tennessee.

Title: Disney's Goof Troop: Volume 2, 3-disc Set, 27 Episodes, Disney Exclusive

reviewText: I am so so so happy they finally released on dvd. I love this cartoon and i really don't understand why they don't release complete sets rather then volume sets. Its sad how you have to wait a lifetime to rewatch your childhood cartoons yet some shows might never get released on dvd. i was 15 when i use to watch this on tv after schools or satarday mornings now am almost 30 and i finally get to rewatch on dvd
Title: Disney's Goof Troop: Volume 2, 3-disc Set, 27 Episodes, Disney Exclusive

reviewText: It is great they have vol 2 out. Let's hope vol 3 will come. Collect volume 1 and 2 and you will like it.
